about_the_game:
Leaf Town is a farm management game that includes pigeon racing gameplay elements. You can manage your own ranch town here. By purchasing farm buildings, arranging them for optimal effects, exploring and expanding the map, and using roguelike items, you can achieve higher profits.

In each game session, every turn has a target gold income requirement. You need to select and purchase the appropriate buildings from the store and strategically place them to get bonuses to meet the income requirements. Moreover, you can continuously accumulate powerful item effects to further enhance the revenue from your buildings.

Each game session features a completely random map, including the buildings and items you can acquire. The game itself has hundreds of buildings and items, ensuring you get a different experience in each game session!
